implementation_output.changes_summary: Created 10 platform installer scripts in scripts/ directory: setup.bat/sh (AC-20.1/2), installer.py (AC-20.3), uninstaller.py (AC-20.4), bootstrap_uv.py (AC-20.5), build_installer.py (AC-20.6), configure_claude_code.py (AC-20.7), test_server.py/bat/sh (AC-20.8). All stdlib-only scripts use only Python standard library. Implemented cross-platform support (Windows/macOS/Linux) with menu-driven interface, uv bootstrap, embedded Python bundle builder, Claude Desktop MCP configuration, and post-install verification suite.
